A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I see where there are a lot of fans unhappy with the new direction this movie has taken the series\, but to be honest\, that made it all the more enjoyable to me. It builds on the original mythos and expands it's potential.\n\nThe parts that ruined it for me were some aspects of cinematography\, which while they've become commonplace in modern film\, just don't seem to belong in a franchise such as star wars (slow mo\, flashback\, etc).
